column3: he Petitioner has filed this application, seeking inter alia the following relief: 1
A  Writ  of  Certiorari  to  quash  the  imposition  of  the  Special  Commodity
Levy on Potatoes and B’ Onions by the document annexed to the petition

A  Writ  of  Mandamus  directing 
the  Respondents 
to 
refund 
to 
the
Petitioner the excess sums of money that were levied in terms of ‘X2’.
